ingredients: Zest from 1/2 an orange (navel or similar)
1 teaspoon fine sea salt or kosher salt
splashes milk for brushing on top
small handfuls turbinado sugar for sprinkling on top
5-6 bosc pears, smallish, cored and sliced thin
1 cup fresh or frozen whole cranberries
Zest from 1/4 an orange (navel or similar)
2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1/2" cubes for dotting top of pie
A pinches fine sea salt or kosher salt
